title: Language education leadership course for systematic learning design implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in educational planning and management, with basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation training for corporate elementary language education administrators, practicing real-world curriculum design and operational scenarios.

learning_goals: Participants can develop a language education design framework by applying systematic literature review methodologies within four weeks
Participants can comparatively evaluate DIY approaches and structured learning design tools in a simulated environment by week 8 to select optimal design strategies
Participants can compile a casebook of language learning designs applicable to corporate settings based on peer feedback by the course conclusion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
